Philippe Lacôte bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri si Côte d'Ivoire. A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2014 bụ Run, nke bụ ihe nkiri a họpụtara maka Lumières Award maka Best French-Language Film na 20th Lumières Awards, na ihe nkiri ya na 2020 Night of the Kings (La Nuit des rois), nke bụ onye mmeri nke Amplify Voices Award na 2020 Toronto International Film Festival.

A họpụtakwara ihe nkiri abụọ ahụ dị ka ihe Côte d'Ivoire nyere na Academy Awards maka Best International Feature Film Oscar, Run for the 88th Academy Awards na 2016 na Night of the Kings maka 93rd Academy Awards na 2021.
N'afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ndị ọka ikpe maka ngalaba asọmpi mba ụwa nke 74th Locarno Film Festival nke emere site n'ụbọchị nke anọ ruo ụbọchị nke ịrị na anọ nke ọnwa Ọgọst.
